channel.title: PS or RS?
channel.description:
How many of you actually prefer private servers over the actual game?
I think private server's kind of kill the cheating.

item.title: PS or RS?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I haven’t seen a playable private server, insofar as nobody has made one with any discernable gameplay. But I haven’t looked in a while so that might have changed. I don’t know.

Runescape is definitely not as fun as it used to be. The more Jagex attempts to widen the appeal of the game the less personality it has. The most recent updates and those that are coming soon will probably kill any enjoyment that’s left there for me.

Read full topic

item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

RS doesn’t suck, Jagex does and for that reason I don’t play RS. I used to code my PS then got bored playing it and decided to just learn more programing, so in short i don’t like either.

item.title: PS or RS?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

ilyaostr9:

yeah, he quit private servers after some noob leaked the cheezscape source

Nah, that usually does put me off, but this time it was because there’s nothing left to do and too many nabs, and I feel like a right ass for uninstalling WoW and deleting my accs last year to play runescape, after watching some vids my friend gave me, including this one which made me feel like stupid (http://video.google.co.uk/videoplay?docid=-3123789306603352940&q=wow+vs+runescape), I came back, runescape sucks don’t play it there’s better games out there

Read full topic

And rs2 is only fun when you have like 50m to use on pking =) ownage whippage and super str pots and go in with dharoks skulled =) thats the only time rs is fun

Got bored -_- now i am doing GFX / Photoshop and its way more fun to be honest, ph yeh and batch virus’s/hacking =)
